review: For $35 I recommend everyone get one - play around with it - it's the digity for watching Netflix!

review: So-so. Difficult to set up,  and I'm in the IT field. When it works,  it's nice,  but it loses the connection a lot. I don't use it anymore. Wasn't worth the aggravation.

review: This item stopped working within days and I have been unable to get any online assistance with it .It was set up properly then out of the blue completely stopped functioning. It now says that I don't even have one hooked up to my system

review: Sometimes takes a while to load movie from electronic to tv and stops on the middle to reload.

review: Did everything advertised and met my expectations
